introductoryNarration.content: Welcome to the deliberation tools suite designed to facilitate thoughtful civic discussion and decision-making. navigationGuidance.title: üîç Facilitating Productive Dialogue
navigationGuidance.content: The tools include structured debate formats, perspective mapping for complex issues, stakeholder analysis templates, and impact assessment frameworks. Use the facilitation controls to manage discussion flow, ensure balanced participation, and help groups work through disagreements constructively toward shared understanding.

privacyNotice.title: üîí Protected Deliberation Space
privacyNotice.content: Deliberation sessions maintain participant confidentiality while preserving the substance of discussions for community benefit.
